Description: Up for auction is an absolutely amazing 2008 Gibson LP Custom 57 Black Beauty 3-Pickup with Factory Bigsby, featuring more expensive Gloss finish! Comes with Original Case, Candy & COA.This is model LPB-7 meaning it’s a 1957 reissue with full mahogany body, built exactly as they were in the late 50’s using analine stains and long neck tenon which adds to the sustain. It is a discontinued model with a real Ebony fingerboard - tight and bouncy (no longer available and rapidly becoming obsolete).FAT neck made from a single piece of mahogany. Loaded with '57 Classic pickups delivering the PAF tone - very dynamic, yet punchy and full.This guitar is in PRISTINE cosmetic condition ~~ as close to being MINT as it gets! Showing no scratches or dents. Neck is PERFECT. The frets show little to no wear. SWEET action and AMAZING playability! The original case is in excellent shape as well.This Custom is a killer player and the sustain is unreal! There is nothing that sounds better than a Les Paul turned way up, grinding out some hot riffs! The tone on this baby will blow you away! Great SUSTAIN.MADE IN USA SERIAL: 7 8XXXX Buy It Now before somebody else does!...or Submit Your Bid... SHIPPING: USA - $87 Canada - $147 WORLDWIDE - $197!Any Form Of Payment is Accepted (Paypal, Credit Cards, etc.)!!!SATISFACTION GUARANTEED OR YOUR MONEY BACK!
